text: Nordland I is the eleventh studio album by the Swedish extreme metal band Bathory. It was released on 18 November 2002 through Black Mark Productions The album is mainly viking metal, so the songs have lyrics about Norse mythology. The album was the first in a two-album set, and no plans for Nordland III ever existed. == Track listing == == People == * Quorthon – all instruments * Kristian Wåhlin – album cover artwork == References == Category:2002 albums
title: Nordland I
